nodes.text: Gnawer's Roost was a neighborhood in the lower levels of Coruscant.

Gnawer's Roost was home to many criminals, and the Galactic Empire had no law enforcement presence there. The technician Pavel Trenol fled there following his escape from Imeici Spire, and a group of Alderaanian Resistance fighters went into the area to find him, eventually finding themselves in the Invisible Hand cantina.
